{"id":492675849,"lang":"javascript","lang_name":"JavaScript","time":"2 years, 1 month","timestamp":1620920865,"status":11,"status_display":"Wrong Answer","runtime":"N/A","url":"/submissions/detail/492675849/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Trapping Rain Water","memory":"N/A","code":"/**\n * @param {number[]} height\n * @return {number}\n */\nvar trap = function(height) {\n    //if prev element and next element < prev element\n    //maxwater <= previous elevation element\n    \n    //if prev element and next element < prev element\n    \n    //Base cases\n    if (height.length < 3) return 0\n    \n    let waterLevel = 0\n    let trap = 0\n    \n    for (let i = 0; i < height.length; i++) { \n        \n       if (height[i] > waterLevel) waterLevel = height[i]\n        \n        if (height[i+1] !== height[i-1]) trap += (waterLevel - height[i])\n    }\n    return (trap)\n    \n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"trapping-rain-water","has_notes":false}
